name: Gravijump (UchicagoGameDesign, kipahlord13)
description:
Gravijump is an infinite runner inspired by mobile infinite runners like Doodle Jump and Jetpack Joyride and the Flash game Gravity Guy. Players run across an infinitely generated world using a gravity flip mechanic to avoid spikes, collect coins, and earn a high score.

Gravijump was developed by David Ramthun, Isaac Darling, Tyler Ziemba, Marie Greaney, Alicia Liu, and Isaac Berman as a part of the UChicago Game Design Development Track in Fall 2022.
